title: ICLR 2018 Conference Acceptance Decision
comment:
The reviewers concerns regarding novelty and the experimental evaluation have been resolved accordingly and all recommend acceptance. I would recommend removing the term "unsupervised" in clustering, as it is redundant. Clustering is, by default, assumed to be unsupervised.

There is some interest in extending this to non-vision domains, however this is beyond the scope of the current work.
